unnormalised: **Major Events Lined Up This Month! Don't Miss Out!**
normalised: **Major Events Lined Up This Month! Don't Miss Out!**

unnormalised: Hey folks! Get your calendars ready because this month is jam-packed with important dates and events that you absolutely shouldn't miss! From national holidays to crucial meetings, there's something for everyone. So, grab a chai, settle in, and let's dive into the deets.
normalised: Hey folks! Get your calendars ready because this month is jam-packed with important dates and events that you absolutely shouldn't miss! From national holidays to crucial meetings, there's something for everyone. So, grab a chai, settle in, and let's dive into the deets.

unnormalised: First up, we've got Independence Day on 15/08/2024. Mark your calendars and prep for a day full of patriotic fervour! Expect parades, flag-hoisting ceremonies, and lots of sweets. This year marks the 77th anniversary of India's independence, so expect some extra special celebrations.
normalised: First up, we've got Independence Day on fifteenth august two thousand and twenty four. Mark your calendars and prep for a day full of patriotic fervour! Expect parades, flag-hoisting ceremonies, and lots of sweets. This year marks the seventy seventh anniversary of India's independence, so expect some extra special celebrations.

unnormalised: Then, there's Raksha Bandhan, which falls on 19th Aug. Tie those rakhis, folks! Time to celebrate the bond between brothers and sisters with traditional rituals and, of course, lots of delicious food! Don't forget to prepone your meetings if you're travelling to celebrate with family.
normalised: Then, there's Raksha Bandhan, which falls on nineteenth August. Tie those rakhis, folks! Time to celebrate the bond between brothers and sisters with traditional rituals and, of course, lots of delicious food! Don't forget to prepone your meetings if you're travelling to celebrate with family.

unnormalised: Next, keep an eye out for the G20 Summit scheduled from 09/09/2024 to 10/09/2024. Delhi will be buzzing with world leaders discussing global issues. Traffic might be a pain, so plan your commute accordingly.
normalised: Next, keep an eye out for the G-twenty Summit scheduled from ninth september two thousand and twenty four to tenth september two thousand and twenty four. Delhi will be buzzing with world leaders discussing global issues. Traffic might be a pain, so plan your commute accordingly.

unnormalised: And finally, don’t forget the deadline for filing your ITR (Income Tax Return) is 31/07/2024. Just a friendly reminder from us to you! Avoid the last-minute rush and file it asap! Better late than never.
normalised: And finally, don’t forget the deadline for filing your I-T-R (Income Tax Return) is thirty first july two thousand and twenty four. Just a friendly reminder from us to you! Avoid the last-minute rush and file it a-s-a-p! Better late than never.

unnormalised: So, that’s the scoop! Stay tuned for more updates and reminders as we get closer to these dates. Enjoy the month, everyone!
normalised: So, that’s the scoop! Stay tuned for more updates and reminders as we get closer to these dates. Enjoy the month, everyone!
